body_html: Yes, I was looking for torch.trsm and torch.trsv exactly while implementing the log-likelihood for a reparameterized gaussian. Currently, I'm forced to use torch.potrs which is calling trsm twice, which is once more than necessary in this application!
body_text: Yes, I was looking for torch.trsm and torch.trsv exactly while implementing the log-likelihood for a reparameterized gaussian. Currently, I'm forced to use torch.potrs which is calling trsm twice, which is once more than necessary in this application!
body: Yes, I was looking for `torch.trsm` and `torch.trsv` exactly while implementing the log-likelihood for a reparameterized gaussian. Currently, I'm forced to use `torch.potrs` which is calling `trsm` twice, which is once more than necessary in this application!
